name: Latency
description:
Latency is a game about catching asteroids and building up a ship that can approach lightspeed.

in its current state, the game has no victory condition, but instead is a  space to test the current features and get feedback on  what works, and what doesn't.

Sporting a custom physics engine, and base building tile system that dynamically tracks ship mass and thrust, Latency is meant to combine aspects of factory games, Tower defense, and retro space shooters for a unique experience.
